languages.text: {n}Маражай склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Какое мне до этого дело? Ты пытаешься умилостивить меня тем, что предпочел меня мон-кай? Что то, что предлагал тебе я, превосходит примитивные связи вашего племени? Это данность, а не благодеяние".

{n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Какое мне до этого дело? Ты пытаешься умилостивить меня тем, что предпочел меня мон-кай? Что то, что предлагал тебе я, превосходит примитивные связи вашего племени? Это данность, а не благодеяние".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

{n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

{n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋把头歪向一旁。{/n}“我凭什么要在乎这些？你这只猴子认为我比其他人更加重要，莫非我应该为此受宠若惊吗？你认为我的提议比你们族人之间原始的束缚更值得考虑，莫非我应该为此欢欣雀跃吗？这不过是理所当然的结果罢了，并不是什么慷慨之举。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋把头歪向一旁。{/n}“我凭什么要在乎这些？你这只猴子认为我比其他人更加重要，莫非我应该为此受宠若惊吗？你认为我的提议比你们族人之间原始的束缚更值得考虑，莫非我应该为此欢欣雀跃吗？这不过是理所当然的结果罢了，并不是什么慷慨之举。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは首をコテンと傾ける。{/n}「気にする必要があるか？お前というモン＝ケイが誰より俺を選んだことを喜べと？俺の提案が、お前達の原始的な絆より優れていると感じたのか？当然だ。お前が寛容な証拠ではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは首をコテンと傾ける。{/n}「気にする必要があるか？お前というモン＝ケイが誰より俺を選んだことを喜べと？俺の提案が、お前達の原始的な絆より優れていると感じたのか？当然だ。お前が寛容な証拠ではない」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Por qué debería importarme? ¿Crees que me halaga que tú, {mf|un|una} mon-keigh, me haya elegido por encima de otros? ¿Que mi oferta te parezca superior a los primitivos lazos que suele forjar tu especie? Eso es un hecho, no una señal de tu largueza».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ladea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Por qué debería importarme? ¿Crees que me halaga que tú, {mf|un|una} mon-keigh, me haya elegido por encima de otros? ¿Que mi oferta te parezca superior a los primitivos lazos que suele forjar tu especie? Eso es un hecho, no una señal de tu largueza».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Et alors ? Selon vous, je devrais me sentir flatté qu'{mf|un|une} vulgaire mon-keigh m'ait préféré à tous les autres ? Qu'{mf|il|elle} ait jugé mon offre supérieure aux liens primitifs qui régentent son espèce ? Ce que vous voudriez faire passer pour une preuve de votre grandeur d'âme n'est guère plus qu'un simple état de fait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Et alors ? Selon vous, je devrais me sentir flatté qu'{mf|un|une} vulgaire mon-keigh m'ait préféré à tous les autres ? Qu'{mf|il|elle} ait jugé mon offre supérieure aux liens primitifs qui régentent son espèce ? Ce que vous voudriez faire passer pour une preuve de votre grandeur d'âme n'est guère plus qu'un simple état de fait. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Warum sollte mich das kümmern? Ihr glaubt wohl, ich fühle mich geschmeichelt, weil Ihr, {mf|ein|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey, mich statt aller anderen ausgewählt habt? Weil Ihr versteht, dass mein Angebot über den primitiven Bindungen Eurer Art steht? Das ist für mich selbstverständlich und kein Zeichen Eurer Bereitwilligkeit."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai legt den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Warum sollte mich das kümmern? Ihr glaubt wohl, ich fühle mich geschmeichelt, weil Ihr, {mf|ein|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey, mich statt aller anderen ausgewählt habt? Weil Ihr versteht, dass mein Angebot über den primitiven Bindungen Eurer Art steht? Das ist für mich selbstverständlich und kein Zeichen Eurer Bereitwilligkeit."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, başını yana yatırıyor.{/n} "Neden umurumda olsun? Bir mon-keigh'in herkes yerine beni tercih etmesinin, sunduklarımı ırkının ilkel bağlarından üstün bulmasının gururumu okşayacağını mı sanıyorsun? Bu bilinen bir şey zaten, cömertliğinin kanıtı değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why should I care? Do you think I should be flattered that you, a mon-keigh, chose me over all others? That you found my offer superior to the primitive bonds of your kind? That is a given, not a sign of your munificence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, başını yana yatırıyor.{/n} "Neden umurumda olsun? Bir mon-keigh'in herkes yerine beni tercih etmesinin, sunduklarımı ırkının ilkel bağlarından üstün bulmasının gururumu okşayacağını mı sanıyorsun? Bu bilinen bir şey zaten, cömertliğinin kanıtı değil."
